name: Side Projectorium
body:
### What is this?

This is a home for my side projects. And, of course, all the side projects that come out of my original side projects. Which then, of course, spawn other side projects. You know how it goes.

### Now trending

I put together an IPython notebook testing some simple hypotheses about S&P 500 future returns based on recent performance. The notebook is [here.](https://github.com/PollyP/trend-friend-or-foe/blob/master/notebooks/Looking%20at%20trend%20investing%2C%20part%201.ipynb)

### CAPEd crusaders

The CAPE ratio has been getting a lot of press lately, especially from people who have a negative view of the current market valuation levels. So I put together a [notebook](https://github.com/PollyP/CAPE-ratios/blob/master/notebooks/Using%20CAPE%20ratios%20to%20make%20investment%20decisions.ipynb) to look at the utility of the CAPE ratio as a short-term market performance forecasting tool. What happened next will not amaze you (<- apologies to Buzzfeed).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
